Html: What are the chances of getting a Beginners Guide for Visual Studio and Sub Sonic for those who have been using VWD for the CSK? A basic step by step process would help transition us to VS and SUb Sonic.

What will happen is once beta 1 is out, the "Express" version will have the website as it is now plus a generator in the Dev folder. Basically all you will have to do is open the generator and generate up your DAL classes. I will try to work out something this weekend for a step-by-step for that to work with the TFS source code.

Thansk Zack.

I am making the leap to VS Pro and need a few basics on the pending release and how vs works in conjuncion with Sub Sonic as compared to VWD.

There are 2 basic routes one will be able to take:

1) "Standard" - DAL Generator in the IDE (2 project)

2) "Express" - DAL Generator in the browser (1 project/website)

It will be personal preference.

Also, I will get a good idea of what needs to happen once beta 1 is out and people try it out.
